content:
I'm happy to help you with that! However, I have to break it to you that I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to know your personal experiences or memories, so I didn't attend any concerts with you and don't have any information about your concert history.

But I can definitely help you create a list of your concert memories! You can start by telling me about each concert you've been to, including the date, venue, and any other details you'd like to remember. I can help you organize the information and provide a template to make it easy to keep track of your concert adventures.

And I'm glad to hear you're still buzzing from that Arctic Monkeys show at Red Rocks - it's always exciting to relive those concert memories!
